title: The Witches of Galdorheim
description: Katrina, the teen witch, with her half-vampire brother, Rune, brave crossing the arctic sea, being attacked by a polar bear, fighting giants, dodging magic attacks by an evil shaman, and that's just in book 1 of this trilogy. Complete in a single volume, follow Kat's adventures from the arctic circle to the Otherworld in Scotland.Contains:Bad SpellingMidnight OilScotch Broomand the short story Spellslinger
author: Marva Dasef
